## Installation

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("JohnCoene/g2r")
```

## Example

It's looks similar to ggplot2.

<div class="row">
<div class="col-md-6">

### ggplot

```{r, fig.height = 8}
library(ggplot2)

iris %>%
  ggplot(aes(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, color = Species)) +
  geom_point() +
  facet_wrap(.~Species)
```

</div>
<div class="col-md-6">

### g2r

```{r}
library(g2r)

iris %>%
  g2(asp(Petal.Length, Petal.Width, color = Species)) %>% 
  fig_point() %>%
  plane_wrap(planes(Species))
```
</div>
</div>
